title: Lynda - Content Marketing: Podcasts and Audio
description:
Lynda - Content Marketing: Podcasts and Audio

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

15m 56s Beginner Oct 19, 2015 | Uploaded in Dec 2, 2015 by 2boweb

Subjects: Audio + Music Marketing 
Software: Audacity 
Author: C.C. Chapman 

Companies have used audio to connect to customers since the invention of the airwaves. Now, with podcasts, content marketers have a great anywhere, anytime way to reach their target audiences. In this short course, content marketing expert C.C. Chapman goes over the best practices for using podcasts in marketing. He shows how to set up, record, and edit a podcast, including tips for when you're on the road or podcasting at events. Then he goes over publishing strategies for getting your podcasts to the public, and tips for keeping content fresh and customers engaged.
